content.en_us:
Regina and Sandalphon work to piece together
reports from the apostles' investigation into
demon activity. But when they are summoned
by the cardinal and pope of the Ilian Church
of Grams, they find themselves placed under
arrest on suspicion of treason.

<ruby><rb>身柄</rb><rt>みがら</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>拘束</rb><rt>こうそく</rt></ruby>されてしまうのだった。

一连串骚动。奎茵和圣德芬
在汇总使徒提交的报告时，
被枢机主教和巫女传唤，
并以叛变教会之名遭到逮捕。

統整情報的柯恩與聖德芬接到
樞機主教與巫女的傳喚，
並因企圖反叛教會的罪名遭到拘捕。

context.en_us: So the only obstacles left before us are the\napostles—Basel's blasted pups.

context.en_us: Though if we pull their strings correctly,\nit might just give us the leverage we need\nto pry Basel from his seat as archbishop.

context.zh_cn: 只要能把他们逼入绝境，追究监管\n不力的责任，把巴赛尔从大主教的\n位置上拉下来也不是梦了。

context.en_us:
With him out of the picture, none would
remain who might challenge my authority.

moments of the Paradise case, it was revealed that

「撒旦」復活，

都是他為了達成目的所做的實驗。

context.en_us:

hiding from his former peers as he works to free
fallen angels—mimicries of angels sealed away
by the magic of the stone.

<ruby><rb>裏切</rb><rt>うらぎ</rt></ruby>り<ruby><rb>者</rb><rt>もの</rt></ruby>として<ruby><rb>使徒</rb><rt>しと</rt></ruby>と<ruby><rb>袂</rb><rt>たもと</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>分</rb><rt>わ</rt></ruby>かった

――<ruby><rb>堕天使</rb><rt>だてんし</rt></ruby>たちを<ruby><rb>解放</rb><rt>かいほう</rt></ruby>してゆく。

天使的假身——堕天使们。
context.zh_tw:
